content.en: Customized Scaffold Revolution: Researchers are exploring the use of computer-aided design and 3D printing techniques to create customized scaffolds for tissue engineering. Algorithms, such as the Computer-Aided System for Tissue Scaffolds (CASTS) and machine learning-based frameworks, are being developed to guide the fabrication process and optimize the properties of the scaffolds. These advancements have the potential to revolutionize tissue engineering and accelerate the development of biomimetic tissues with complex structures.
content.da: Skræddersyet stilladsrevolution: Forskere undersøger brugen af computerstøttet design og 3D-printteknikker til at skabe skræddersyede stilladser til vævsteknik. Algoritmer, såsom det computerstøttede system for vævsstilladser (CASTS) og maskinlæringsbaserede rammer, udvikles for at vejlede fremstillingsprocessen og optimere stilladsernes egenskaber. Disse fremskridt har potentiale til at revolutionere vævsteknik og fremskynde udviklingen af biomimetiske væv med komplekse strukturer.
